---
id: describe-tasks
title: "DescribeTasks"
description: "After starting recording, developers can call this API to query the list of recording tasks that are in progress or have ended."
api: 
info_path: extended_services/cloud_recording/en/server/open-api-desc
---

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>DescribeTasks</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/"}></MethodEndpoint>


After starting recording, developers can call this API to query the list of recording tasks that are in progress or have ended.

<Note title="Note">Call frequency limit: 10 times/second</Note>

## Request

Application ID, a unique credential assigned by ZEGOCLOUD. When not filled in, queries recording tasks for all rooms under the AppId.","example":"1230"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"PageOffset"} required={false} schemaName={"integer"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** `>= 1`"} schema={{"type":"integer","description":"Page number for paginated queries, starting from 1. This value must be less than or equal to 50 and greater than 0. When not filled in, defaults to 50.","default":50,"minimum":1,"maximum":50,"example":50}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"StartTime"} required={true} schemaName={"int64"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer","format":"int64","description":"Query start time, Unix timestamp in milliseconds. Start time cannot be earlier than 3 days before the current time.","example":1628474401000}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"EndTime"} required={true} schemaName={"int64"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer","format":"int64","description":"Query end time, Unix timestamp in milliseconds. EndTime must be greater than StartTime, and the query time span cannot exceed 3 days. The API only returns records where the recording start time is within the query time range.","example":1628475402000}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs>
